description:
Course Overview

In this course, we cover the animation Panel, using the Puppet Warp Tool, automation in Photoshop and how to create your own brushes and other resources.

About The Instructor

Moylin Yuan has over 8 years of experience with Adobe Photoshop, and is an Animation graduate of the SAE institute. She is an expert in graphic design, visual media and has an extensive portfolio of 2D and 3D Design. Through gradberry, she aims to educate the masses in designing with Photoshop.
title: Adobe Photoshop CS5: Intermediate Level
